public class CovarionHKY
extends AbstractCovarionDNAModel

A model with hidden states that represent different rates.

Constructor Detail

CovarionHKY

public CovarionHKY(HiddenNucleotides dataType,
                   Parameter kappaParameter,
                   Parameter hiddenClassRates,
                   Parameter switchingRates,
                   FrequencyModel freqModel)
Parameters:
dataType - the datatype to be used
kappaParameter - the rate of transitions versus transversions
hiddenClassRates - the relative rates of the hidden categories (first hidden category has rate 1.0 so this parameter has dimension one less than number of hidden categories. each hidden category.
switchingRates - rate of switching between hidden categories
freqModel - the frequencies
